src_original: 363.003. vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhavedrūpamanantaram/  363.004. saptāhābhyantare tatra vātā vānti sudāruṇāḥ//309//  363.007. tato bhavati nirdeśo maharṣervacanam yathā/  363.009. guhyamāvaraṇaṃ kuryātprākāraparikhāṃ khanet/  363.014. saptāhābhyantarāttatra ulkāpātāḥ sudāruṇāḥ//314//
363.015. saṃdhyā ca lohitā bhāti candrasūryau tu lohitau/
363.018. dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśam//316//
363.019. vīṇāśca divi dṛśyante nava māsānna varṣati/
363.021. jayati ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃśca hayagajarathamukhyān mantriṇo madhyamāhne/
